Class.ClassComment: ChannelFactory /** * Factory for creating JGroups channels. * @author Paul Ferraro */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Returns the protocol stack configuration of this channel factory. * @return the protocol stack configuration of this channel factory */

/** * Determines whether or not the specified message response indicates the fork stack or fork channel required to handle a request does not exist on the recipient node. * @param response a message response * @return true, if the response indicates a missing fork stack or channel. */
